column5: leaving for destin fla friday. was just wondering if anyone knows what to fish for there this time of year and what to use as far as bait or artificals, I have good beach axcess.
Not sure about Destin but you may want to post here.  http://outdoorsbest.zeroforum.com/zeromain?id=1
I hear cougars are in season, they're generally beach dwellers, and a tight fitting Speedo might be just the lure you're lookin for  Have a great time.  Joey
Cougar note....  make sure that your using at least an 8" worm!!

never fished in destin, but have had a lot of luck night fishing off of beaches using calamari and 1ounce weights fishing the bottom.  usually catch some sharks and such.  its also a great way to meet people when you reel that shark in where they have been swimming all day.  hope ya have a good time.  jason
